subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Boston’s Mike Lowell is a testament to the fact that an aging third baseman can rebound from surgery to repair a torn labrum in the hip, which is good news for the Yankees and Alex Rodriguez.
snippet: Boston’s Mike Lowell is a testament to the fact that an aging third baseman can rebound from surgery to repair a torn labrum in the hip, which is good news for the Yankees and Alex Rodriguez.
